product_name: Cloverdale Milk Skim Instant Powder 10 KG/22lbs - Canadian Made
short_description:
Cloverdale Instant Skim Milk Powder – High-Quality Dairy for Versatile Applications

Cloverdale Instant Skim Milk Powder is a premium Canadian-made dairy ingredient, perfect for a wide range of culinary and industrial applications. With excellent solubility, dispersibility, and wettability, this high-protein, low-fat milk powder is ideal for baking, cooking, and beverage formulations.

Why Choose Cloverdale Instant Skim Milk Powder?

Pure, Nutritious, and High-Quality

  • Made from 100% real skim milk, providing essential nutrients and a clean dairy taste.
  • High in protein and calcium, supporting balanced nutrition.

Superior Solubility & Easy Mixing

  • Dissolves instantly in hot or cold water, making it ideal for instant beverages and food applications.
  • Designed for excellent dispersion, ensuring smooth, lump-free results.

Versatile Culinary & Industrial Applications

  • Baking: Enhances texture, flavor, and browning in bread, cakes, and pastries.
  • Beverages: Perfect for hot cocoa, smoothies, coffee creamers, and protein shakes.
  • Soups & Sauces: Adds creaminess and richness to instant soups and dressings.
  • Desserts: Used in puddings, ice creams, and confectionery for a smooth finish.
  • Infant Formula & Nutritional Products: A trusted dairy base in powdered nutritional formulations.

Product Details

  • Size: 10 KG (22 lbs) bulk packaging
  • Made in Canada, ensuring strict quality control and premium standards
  • Shelf-Stable & Long-Lasting, perfect for commercial and home use

Ideal for Food Service & Manufacturing

Cloverdale Instant Skim Milk Powder is a reliable, high-quality ingredient for bakeries, food processors, beverage manufacturers, and home kitchens. Stock up today and experience the convenience of premium powdered dairy!

product_name: Neilson 3.25% Ultrafiltered Milk, 1L
short_description: Neilson ultrafiltered milk s fresh milk from Canadian dairy farms that passes through a fine filter to concentrate the natural protein and reduce the lactose, a naturally occurring sugar in milk. It does not require refrigeration and stays fresh in your pantry. Just chill prior to serving and after opening. Offering 18 g of protein per 250 mL and 25% less lactose (sugar) than regular milk, Neilson ultrafiltered milk is a simple way to fuel your day with a little extra joy.

product_name: Breyers French Vanilla Frozen Dessert, 1.41 L
short_description: Breyers Family Classic French vanilla is our richest, most indulgent vanilla frozen dessert, made with real vanilla beans, and flavours and colours from natural sources. It's the ideal sweet treat, with a seriously creamery flavour that pairs perfectly with all your favourite desserts. Crafted in a Canadian creamery with Canadian dairy, this delicious ice cream is made using 100% natural and sustainably sourced real vanilla beans from Rainforest Alliance Certified farms. An absolute must in every freezer, it's the perfect sweet treat or snack for every day of the week.    Breyers has been a staple in Canadian freezers for over 30 years. When you buy Breyers, you know you are buying a dessert that uses the highest quality ingredients in all our ice cream and frozen dessert recipes.  In 1866, William Breyer took his passion for creating high-quality desserts and set out to start his very own brand of ice cream – Breyers. Thanks to his commitment to delivering delicious ice cream using only local and simple ingredients, the Breyers brand was soon loved by customers far and wide! Today, Breyers has committed to using flavours and colours from only natural sources, sustainably farmed fruit and vanilla, and Canadian milk and cream. Breyers is proudly made in Simcoe, Ontario, using 100% Canadian Dairy.

product_name: Popsicle Revello Frozen Dairy Dessert Bars, 12 x 60 ml bars
short_description: Enjoy this family favourite, Popsicle Revello Frozen Dairy Dessert Bars is one of our most classic Popsicles! A creamy vanilla dairy bar surrounded by a thick, chocolatey coating, this frozen treat is great for any time of the year. They are also made with colours and flavours from natural sources, making them the perfect frozen dessert for the whole family. Ideal for any occasion, serve them at a party or keep them in the freezer for an after-dinner frozen snack. Popsicle pops have been a treasured treat for over 100 years and remain a Canadian family favourite. The very first Popsicle® ice pop was created way back in 1905 by an 11-year-old named Frank Epperson. That’s right, Popsicle was invented by a kid. After a long day of play, Frank went inside, but left his cup of soda with the stirring stick still in it out on the porch. The night got cold, and when Frank went outside the next morning, he found his drink frozen like an icicle. Frank called his invention the “Epsicle.” It was a hit with the kids at school, and later with his kids, who called it “Pop’s sicle.” The name was catchy, and the treat was delicious, so Frank patented it in 1923 to share his Popsicle ice pops with the world. A lot has happened since 1905, when the first Popsicle ice pop was made. Be sure to try our other products in the Popsicle® family and discover your favourite frozen treat, including our delicious Cyclone Popsicle® and malty fudge chocolate Popsicle Fudgsicle® bar.

Great Value Omega-3 Large White eggs are packed with omega-3 and vitamin E. They contain 10 times more omega-3 and 4 times more vitamin E than regular eggs. product_name: McCain® 9 Minute No Flip Potato Patties, Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients, 600g
short_description: Elevate breakfast time with crispy, savoury potato patties in under 10 minutes—no flipping required. McCain® 9 Minute No Flip Potato Patties make it easy to serve up delicious, restaurant-level golden potato goodness straight from your air fryer or oven at home. A satisfying solution for fast-paced mornings, our premium frozen potato patties are a family favourite. Made with specially selected potatoes and simple ingredients, McCain Hashbrowns contain no artificial flavours, hydrogenated oils, trans fat or cholesterol. There’s no need to hover over a hot pan with these no-flip potato patties, simply place them in a single layer in your pre-heated air fryer or oven and they’ll cook up crispy and delicious to a light golden colour in minutes. A versatile morning staple, enjoy these 9-Minute Potato Patties on their own as quick and crispy breakfast treats on busy weekdays or savour as go-to sides in leisurely weekend brunches with friends and family. Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients. COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Air fryer - preheat to 390°F (200°C), arrange frozen patties in a single layer on bottom of basket, air fry for 7-11 minutes to a light golden colour. Oven - preheat to 425°F (218°C), spread frozen patties in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 9-11 minutes. Not recommended for cooking in a microwave. See full details on packaging.

product_name: McCain® Classic Hash Brown Potato Patties, Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients, 20 Pack
short_description: Take breakfast to the next level with McCain® Classic Hash Brown Potato Patties. These convenient hash browns cook up crispy and golden in your air fryer or oven, helping you to create restaurant-quality breakfasts in the comfort of your own home. Made with quality potatoes, McCain Hashbrowns are low in saturated fat and free of trans fat and cholesterol. A convenient meal option to help fuel your day, these frozen potato patties can be enjoyed on their own as easy crispy breakfast treats on busy weekdays or savoured as go-to sides during leisurely brunches on weekends and holidays. Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients. COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Air fryer - preheat to 360°F (182°C), arrange frozen patties in a single layer on bottom of basket, air fry for 11-13 minutes to a light golden colour. Oven - preheat to 425°F (218°C), spread frozen patties in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 26-30 minutes, turning halfway through. Not recommended for cooking in a microwave. See full details on packaging.

product_name: McCain® Potato Pancakes, Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients, 600g
short_description: McCain® Potato Pancakes bring everyone to the breakfast table with a tempting blend of real shredded potatoes and light seasoning. Perfect as a quick and delicious side dish, the secret ingredient in a special brunch recipe, or simply on their own, McCain potato pancakes cook up golden and crispy in your air fryer, on your stovetop, or in the oven. Lightly seasoned with onions and spices for a classic savoury flavour everyone will love, these quick potato pancakes cook up from frozen in as few as 9 minutes, depending on your method of preparation. Made with specially selected potatoes and simple ingredients, these easy potato pancakes contain no artificial flavours, hydrogenated oils, trans fat or cholesterol. Breakfast will never be the same once you add this classic potato dish to the menu. Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients. COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Air fryer - preheat to 330°F (165°C), arrange frozen potato pancakes in a single layer on bottom of basket, air fry for 9-11 minutes to a light golden colour. Pan - Heat a small amount of cooking oil in a non-stick frying pan, add frozen potato pancakes in a single layer, cook on medium-high for 14-18 minutes, turning halfway through. Oven - preheat to 425°F (218°C), spread frozen potato pancakes in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 18-20 minutes, turning halfway through. Not recommended for cooking in a microwave. See full details on packaging.

product_name: McCain® Savoury Homefries, Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients, 650g
short_description: McCain® Savoury Homefries take a classic diner favourite and elevate it with a subtle coating of garlic, onion, herbs and spices. Crispy, golden, breakfast home fries made from specially selected potatoes are a satisfying way to start any day. Pop them in the oven and bake them or enjoy quick and delicious air fryer home fries in minutes, however you prepare them you’re in for a treat. Our frozen savoury home fries contain no artificial flavours, hydrogenated oils, trans fat or cholesterol, so you can always feel good about sharing these crispy home fries with your friends and family. Enjoy McCain home fries for breakfast on their own, as a savoury side dish, or add them to your favourite bacon and eggs recipes to elevate any brunch menu—there’s no wrong way to enjoy these crispy classics. Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients. COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Air fryer - preheat to 390°F (200°C), fill basket halfway with frozen homefries, air fry for 14-16 minutes to a light golden colour, sliding basket out and shaking halfway through. Oven - preheat to 425°F (218°C), spread frozen homefries in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 21-25 minutes, turning halfway through. Not recommended for cooking in a microwave. See full details on packaging.

product_name: Marigo Black Berry Rice, 1 kg / pack
short_description: Embrace the distinctive qualities of Marigold Black Berry Rice, where the nutty depth of black rice meets the subtle essence of natural berry, providing a delicious and nutritious twist to your meals. Perfect for adding a gourmet touch to everyday dishes or special recipes, this rice offers a unique culinary experience that delights both the palate and the eyes. Black berry rice is a specialty rice that is a source of iron, vitamin E and high in antioxidants. It is less sugary than black glutinous rice and is higher in fibre than many fruits. It's light and fluffy texture has a mild and nutty taste, making eating healthier. Riceberry also lends itself well to weekly meal prep: Simply cook a larger batch and freeze portions of leftover riceberry in a thin, flat layer in microwave-safe plastic wrap. To reheat, just place one of the frozen rice packs in the microwave on high for a minute and a half or until warmed through. Or re-steam in a pan with 2 to 4 tablespoons of water on low, stirring frequently until the water is absorbed and the rice is heated through. Cooking Suggestions: Stovetop Method: Rinse rice thoroughly. Use a 2:1 water-to-rice ratio, bring to a boil, then cover and simmer for 30-40 minutes until the water is absorbed and rice is tender. Rice Cooker: Follow your rice cooker’s instructions for cooking black rice, adjusting water levels as needed for best results. Flavorful Additions: Enhance with herbs, spices, or coconut milk during cooking for added depth of flavor. Serving Ideas: Salads: Create vibrant salads by mixing Marigold Black Berry Rice with fresh vegetables, nuts, and a tangy vinaigrette. Bowl Dishes: Use as a base for grain bowls topped with roasted vegetables, lean proteins, and a zesty sauce. Exotic Sides: Pair with grilled meats or seafood for a stunning and nutritious side dish. Sweet Treats: Incorporate into rice puddings, fruit compotes, or as a base for berry-flavored desserts.

product_name: Y&Y black glutinous rice, 2 kg
short_description: Immerse yourself in the rich and nutty flavor of Y&Y Black Glutinous Rice, a premium variety of rice that offers a unique culinary experience. Also known as "black sticky rice" or "forbidden rice," this heirloom grain is prized for its striking color, chewy texture, and nutty taste. Whether used in sweet desserts, savory dishes, or as a base for colorful rice bowls, Y&Y Black Glutinous Rice adds depth and sophistication to your culinary creations. Y&Y black glutinous rice. While many whole grains contain gluten, black rice is a nutritious, naturally gluten-free option that can be enjoyed by those on a gluten-free diet. Black rice is naturally gluten-free and can be a good option for those with celiac disease or gluten sensitivity. Black rice is healthy, packed with protein and fiber. Learn how to cook black rice using black sticky rice (black glutinous rice), and make this Southeast Asian sweet dessert. Usage Suggestions: • Desserts: Use black glutinous rice to make traditional Asian desserts such as black rice pudding, sweet rice cakes, or coconut black rice. • Savory Dishes: Incorporate into savory dishes like black rice risotto, rice salads, or stuffed bell peppers for a unique twist on classic recipes. • Breakfast Porridge: Cook black glutinous rice with coconut milk and sweeteners to create a creamy and indulgent breakfast porridge. • Colorful Rice Bowls: Use cooked black glutinous rice as a base for vibrant rice bowls topped with colorful vegetables, proteins, and sauces. Experience the depth of flavor and versatility of Y&Y Black Glutinous Rice in your culinary creations. Whether you're cooking traditional Asian recipes or experimenting with fusion cuisine, this nutrient-rich rice variety is sure to impress with its distinctive taste and beautiful presentation.

product_name: Barilla Rotini Pasta, Barilla Rotini 410g
short_description:
Rotini (meaning "twists"), also known as Fusilli, are two-inch lengths of thick, screw-like pasta from Northern Italy. The shape was inspired by children, since it is fun to eat and pairs well with a wide variety of pasta sauces.

At BARILLA, we're passionate about pasta. After all, we have been pasta makers since 1877. As an Italian family-owned food company, BARILLA pasta is synonymous with high quality and "al dente" perfection every time. product_name: CAPRI Pure Vegetable Oil 4L - Your All-Purpose Hero for Healthy, Delicious Cooking!
short_description:
Hello, home chefs and culinary enthusiasts! Have you been on a quest for a kitchen staple that’s as versatile as it is reliable? Well, let's raise a toast (with bread you've fried up yourself, of course) to our ever-dependable Vegetable Oil!

Now, this isn't just some ordinary oil. This is the Swiss Army knife of your kitchen, ready to step up to the plate (or pan) whether you're sautéing, frying, baking, or grilling. With this vegetable oil, you've got a ticket to Crispy Town for your fried chicken, a passport to Flavor Country for your sautéed veggies, and the secret ingredient to a moist and delicious cake.

But wait, you're thinking, "Isn't oil, well...oily?" Yes and no. While our vegetable oil does bring the heat, it does so in a way that enhances your food, rather than overpowering it. It's a smooth operator, providing the perfect medium for cooking without stealing the spotlight from your culinary creations.

Our vegetable oil also doesn't discriminate when it comes to heat. short_description:

  • 5L Capacity: Large jug for bulk use, yielding hundreds of servings or cleaning applications.

  • Natural & Pure: Free from additives, making it a clean choice for food and home use.

  • Eco-Friendly: A natural alternative to chemical cleaners, safe for wooden surfaces and stainless steel.
  • Long Shelf Life: Stable at room temperature, ensuring lasting freshness and value.
Why Choose This ItemThe Gordon Pure White Vinegar is a go-to for its reliability and multi-purpose benefits, combining culinary enhancement with household cleaning in one bottle. Its 5% acetic acid strength delivers tangy flavor to dressings and marinades while effectively disinfecting and shining surfaces without harsh chemicals. The 5L size offers exceptional value for bulk users, reducing trips to the store and waste. Customers love its natural purity and versatility, making it a staple for eco-conscious homes, busy kitchens, or professional settings. Preparation & Serving Details
  • Culinary Preparation: Mix with oil, herbs, and spices for salad dressings; use in marinades for meats or veggies; add to sauces for tang.
  • Cleaning Instructions: Combine with baking soda and hot water to unclog sinks; spray on chrome or stainless steel for a streak-free shine; disinfect cutting boards by soaking in vinegar.
  • Serving Size: Use 1–2 tbsp per serving for dressings or marinades; for cleaning, dilute as needed (e.g., 1:1 with water for sprays). A 5L jug provides hundreds of uses.
  • Storage: Store at room temperature in a cool, dry place. Keep tightly capped to maintain potency.

product_name: Coco Natura Organic Pure Coconut Vinegar (236 ml)
short_description:
A healthy alternative to other vinegars! Coconut vinegar is made from 100% pure coconut sap, naturally fermented. It is high source of FOS (a prebiotic that promotes digestive health), and has a high content of amino acids, vitamins and minerals.

Use for salad dressings and dips, or skin care and internal cleansing.

Certified Organic

  • RAW
  • Prebiotic
  • Naturally fermented
  • Low GI
  • Certified Organic
  • Additive-free
  • Nutrient rich
  • 100% Natural Sap from the Philippines
Collecting the Sap: In the Philippines, the coconut tree, known for its rich abundance of healthy produce, is called the “Tree of Life”. The unopened flower of the coconut tree is the source of the sweet sap, which is the only ingredient in Coco Natura. This is the same nectar that bees gather to turn into honey. For people, gathering the sap requires age-old techniques and great physical agility. A person climbs up and down the tall coconut trees, balancing on a catwalk hung between them. A sharp knife is used to make a very fine slice in the bud. Several incisions twice a day results in the continuous flow of nectar. The nectar is then collected to produce our organic, naturally delicious and multi-purpose Coconut Vinegar.


This item is a non-taxable food item.

Besides using it in traditional Asian dishes, try it in mainstream American foods, classic Mediterranean dishes or exotic Caribbean cuisine.

product_name: Kikkoman Lite Soy Sauce 591mL, 591ML
short_description: Kikkoman® Less Sodium Soy Sauce is brewed exactly the same way as all-purpose Kikkoman Soy Sauce. Although there is less sodium in Less Sodium Soy Sauce, all the flavor and quality characteristics remain because it is aged before extracting the salt. However, to maintain this full umami flavor, we recommend using it during the latter stage of cooking in braising sauces, soups and stews, vegetables or stir-frys.

product_name: Lee Kum Kee Gluten-Free Soy Sauce, 1.89L (½ Gallon) – Naturally Brewed, Non-GMO, Wheat-Free Soy Sauce for Cooking & Marinades
short_description:
With this Lee Kum Kee gluten-free soy sauce, your patrons can enjoy the classic Asian flavor they know and love - but without the gluten! This naturally-brewed soy sauce is made according to a traditional recipe with whole soybeans to offer a deep reddish-brown color and a rich, umami flavor. Unlike many commercially-available varieties of soy sauce, this product is brewed without wheat, making it naturally gluten-free. Packaged in a bulk 1/2 gallon bottle with a convenient handle, this gluten-free soy sauce is a perfect way to ensure that your Asian restaurant remains well-stocked with the essentials. Your patrons with celiac disease, gluten allergies, and gluten sensitivities will appreciate having this gluten-free version available for use. Plus, this product is made with non-GMO soybeans and contains no artificial flavorings, colorings, or preservatives, making it a natural choice for your establishment.

Soy sauce is one of the world's oldest condiments and it has a long history of adding delicious flavor to a wide variety of Asian dishes! It brings deeply savory, salty taste to classic Asian dishes and fusion dishes alike. Use this soy sauce in your kitchen to flavor stir frys, noodle dishes, Japanese shoyu ramen, and a whole host of other delicious entrees. It's also a great addition to marinades for meats, fish, vegan proteins like tofu and tempeh, or vegetables. Try blending it with oil and spices like garlic, ginger, and chili to make delicious dressings to add to finished dishes! This gluten-free soy sauce can also be used to refill tabletop containers for your patrons to use as a condiment for their meals. It makes a perfect dip for practically any variety of sushi, as well as for meats and bite-sized appetizers. Invite your patrons to drizzle this soy sauce over noodle dishes, stir frys, or fried rice to allow them to adjust the flavor to their liking.

product_name: Lee Kum Kee 5.3 lb. Sushi Unagi Sauce - 6/Case
short_description: Take the prep work out of serving traditional Japanese sauces with thisdelicious, ready-to-use Lee Kum Kee sushi unagi sauce. Also known as _unagi notare_ or eel sauce, this classic condiment is made with soy sauce, sugar, andsalted sake rice wine to create a salty sauce with sweet caramelization & abeautiful golden-brown color that's versatile in application. Packaged in abulk 5.3 lb. jar with a convenient handle, this unagi sauce is a perfect wayto ensure that you keep your Asian restaurant well-stocked with theessentials. Plus, it's made without artificial flavors, colors, orpreservatives, making this sauce a natural choice for your establishment.Unagi sauce is a traditional accompaniment to Japanese grilled unagi (eel) orunagi sushi. It also makes a delicious dip for many varieties of sushi,including nigiri, shrimp tempura, or temaki. It also makes a great topping forHawaiian poke bowls. However, unagi sauce isn't limited to sushi! Thiscaramelized condiment can be used as a delicious barbecue sauce that's perfectfor practically any grilled entree, such as meat, fish, tofu, mushrooms, orany vegetable. Just a light coating of this sauce is all you need to addcomplex umami flavor to a whole host of dishes! Try creating a satisfyingfusion entree by marinating a flank steak in unagi sauce with ginger, garlic,chili peppers, & scallions, then grilling to medium rare. No matter how youchoose to use it, this delicious & versatile sushi unagi sauce will adddelicious Japanese flavor to your menu.

While running a humble tea and oyster soup shop in Guangdong, China, Lee Kum Sheung had a happy accident; one day in 1888, he simmered his oysters for too long. product_name: Lee Kum Kee 8 mL Less Sodium Soy Sauce Packet - 500/Case
short_description: With this Lee Kum Kee less sodium soy sauce, your patrons can enjoy the classic Asian flavor they know and love without compromising their commitment to healthy eating! This naturally-brewed soy sauce is made according to a traditional recipe to offer a deep reddish-brown color and a rich, umami flavor, even without the extra salt. With just 600 mg of sodium per serving, this less sodium version is approximately 40% lower in sodium than Lee Kum Kee's premium soy sauce! Packaged in a convenient, easy-to-open 8 mL packet, this less sodium soy sauce can be tossed in with take out orders or offered as a condiment at quick service restaurants. Your health-conscious patrons will appreciate having this lower sodium option available for use. Plus, this product is made with non-GMO soybeans and contains no artificial flavorings, making it a natural choice for your establishment. Soy sauce is one of the world's oldest condiments and it has a long history of adding delicious flavor to a wide variety of Asian dishes! It makes a perfect dip for practically any variety of sushi, as well as for meats and bite-sized appetizers. It brings deeply savory, salty flavor to classic Asian dishes and fusion dishes alike. Invite your patrons to drizzle this soy sauce over noodle dishes, stir frys, or fried rice to allow them to adjust the flavor to their liking.  While running a humble tea and oyster soup shop in Guangdong, China, Lee Kum Sheung had a happy accident; one day in 1888, he simmered his oysters for too long. His normally clear oyster soup had turned into a thick brown sauce with a rich aroma and an astonishingly complex flavor. Lee knew he had accidentally made something wonderful! He created the Lee Kum Kee brand to promote his newly-invented oyster sauce, and as the sauce's popularity began to grow, so did his company. Though today, Lee Kum Kee is an international brand that is well-known throughout China and around the world, this family-owned business has remained rooted in its beginnings as a simple company founded on delicious flavor. Lee Kum Kee offers a wide variety of traditional Chinese sauces and condiments and is constantly creating innovative new flavors that set the standard for great taste. Whether you're looking for authentic Chinese flavor or delicious condiments to help you keep up with industry trends, Lee Kum Kee offers something for every establishment.

product_name: Grey Poupon Country Dijon Mustard 48 oz. Jar
short_description: Add rich, gourmet flavor to any sandwich or wrap with the convenience of thisGrey Poupon country Dijon mustard! This versatile mustard can be used in avariety of ways to enhance the flavors of your most popular foods, and yourpatrons are sure to recognize and trust the brand. Grey Poupon's coarse-graincountry recipe combines whole mustard seeds, white wine, and spices for ataste that is sharp and tangy and a perfectly textured consistency that iscreamy yet crunchy. Compared to the tangy taste of traditional yellow mustard,this country Dijon mustard will add just the right amount of spice and heat tosandwiches and vinaigrettes. Whether you use this Grey Poupon country Dijon mustard as acondiment, sandwich spread, or cooking ingredient, it will help you kick upthe flavors of any dish!    Grey Poupon was founded in 1866 when Dijon mustard manufacturers Maurice Greyand Auguste Poupon started a partnership to finance Grey's newly inventedmustard machine, which increased the speed of production of the mustard bygrinding the seeds. In 1946, the Heublein Company bought the American rightsfrom the original French company and then was eventually acquired by KraftFoods in 1999. Throughout its long history, the Grey Poupon brand is known forhaving high-quality and high-performing Dijon mustard with the perfect amountof spice and creaminess. product_name: BULK BUY Pack of 8 – Hellmann’s Vegan Dressing & Spread, 8 x 340 mL Bottles Each (Total 8 Bottles, 1,360 mL per Pack) – Certified Vegan, Gluten-Free Mayonnaise-Style Condiment
short_description: For a great tasting alternative to traditional mayonnaise made from 100% plant-based ingredients, Hellmann's Vegan Dressing & Spread is all you need to turn what looks like an everyday meal into an epic vegan dish. Turn nothing into something, with just a bit of creativity and a dollop of our sauce. Hellmann's vegan mayonnaise type dressing can help you transform your meals into something truly delicious, and with this 4-pack you'll have more deliciousness to spread. Enjoy the unmistakably amazing taste of Hellmann's Vegan Dressing, knowing that it's packed with quality ingredients in a certified vegan recipe with no compromise on taste or texture. Free from trans fat and low in saturated fat, as well as being gluten-free and a good source of omega-3 polyunsaturates, this vegan mayo type dressing is the perfect condiment for vegan burgers, fries and sandwiches that you can feel good about serving to your friends and family. We've removed the eggs, but not the original taste you love about our spread. Did you notice the slightly darker tint of our bottles? That's because they are now made from 100% recycled plastics and are recyclable. Our better plastics practices can save approximately 14 million plastic bottles from being used every year. There is no denying that food waste is a huge problem. Our goal is to show that ingredients commonly left-behind in the back of your fridge can be transformed into something new. With Hellmann's, you can create exciting dishes with real taste for less waste. #maketastenotwaste

product_name: Organic Chyavanprash Jam/ Herbal Jam
short_description: Chyavanprash has an interesting story behind its name: “Chyavanprash is linked to the story of the Rishi Chyvana and the events surrounding his tale. Chyvana devoted a large part of his time to pursuing enlightenment, which eventually attracted the attention of the Devas or Gods. Through their fear of Chyvana’s devotion and the high chance of him being admitted to the Heavenly realms – which they really didn’t want - they attempted to put a stop to his actions by summoning the beautiful nymph Menakā. Menakā quickly sought out Chywana and this is where the story of Chyavanprash really begins. Menakā worked hard to prevent Chyvana from deep meditation, offering beautiful flowers and delicious foods as distractions. After months of this, Chyvana slowly turned his attentions to Menakā’s beauty and kindness, and away from his original goal of enlightenment. It wasn’t long before Chyvana and Menakā were together, though this wasn’t without its problems. Not only was Menakā a lot younger than Chyvana but she was also immortal, which doesn’t make for a great pairing. Chyvana quickly abandoned his practices and set out into the forest to find a way to solve their problem. After preparing an elixir to reverse his aging, Chyvana returned completely rejuvenated. Rather than remaining as an elderly man, he had a much more youthful appearance and a new lease of life. Thanks to this mysterious elixir that we now know to be Chyavanprash, Chyvana and Menakā remained together and went on to, as they say, live happily ever after.”

product_name: Mike's Hot Honey Original Bulk Food Service 12 lbs
short_description:
Bring the perfect balance of sweet and heat to your dishes with Mike's Hot Honey Original. Made with 100% pure honey infused with real chili peppers, this all-natural, paleo-friendly honey adds a flavorful kick to everything from pizza and fried chicken to sauces, dressings, and marinades. Free from artificial sugars and preservatives, Mike's Hot Honey offers a deliciously bold, spicy-sweet profile that enhances any meal. Packaged in a convenient 12 lb. jug, this bulk size is ideal for restaurants, caterers, or refilling tabletop bottles in high-volume kitchens.

Key Features:

  • 100% Pure Honey: Made from high-quality, all-natural honey infused with real chili peppers for a perfect balance of sweetness and heat.
  • No Artificial Ingredients: Contains no artificial sugar or preservatives, making it a clean, paleo-friendly option.
  • Versatile Flavor: Adds a sweet and spicy twist to pizza, fried chicken, barbecue, and more. Also great for mixing into sauces, dressings, marinades, and beverages.
  • Bulk 12 lb. Jug: Perfect for back-of-house use in restaurants, catering businesses, or refilling smaller bottles for tabletop service.

Product Specifications:

  • Weight: 12 lb.
  • Ingredients: 100% pure honey infused with chili peppers
  • Preservatives: None (all-natural)
  • Ideal Uses: Topping for pizza, fried chicken, barbecue; ingredient for sauces, dressings, marinades, and beverages

Benefits:

  • Sweet and Spicy Fusion: The combination of pure honey and real chili peppers creates a unique flavor profile that elevates both savory and sweet dishes.
  • Perfect for High-Volume Kitchens: The bulk 12 lb. jug ensures you have plenty of Mike’s Hot Honey on hand to meet the demands of busy kitchens or refill bottles for table service.
  • Versatile Culinary Ingredient: From drizzling on pizza to enhancing sauces, dressings, and marinades, this hot honey is an essential addition to any professional kitchen.
  • Paleo-Friendly and All-Natural: Enjoy the clean, pure taste of honey without any artificial additives or preservatives, making it suitable for a range of dietary preferences.

Ideal For:

  • Pizzerias and Restaurants: The sweet heat of Mike's Hot Honey makes it a perfect topping for pizza, adding a bold flavor twist.
  • Catering and Events: Ideal for catering businesses or large events, where this bulk-sized jug can be used to prepare delicious sauces, dressings, and more.
  • Creative Chefs: Whether you're looking to enhance fried chicken, barbecue, or craft a signature hot honey cocktail, this honey is a versatile, must-have ingredient.

Why Choose Mike's Hot Honey Original Bulk? For a spicy-sweet burst of flavor that enhances both savory and sweet dishes, Mike's Hot Honey Original is the go-to choice for chefs, caterers, and food enthusiasts alike. Infused with real chili peppers, this 100% pure honey adds a unique, all-natural kick to everything from pizza to beverages.

product_name: Campbell's Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup 1.36 L/48oz (12 pack)
short_description:
Serve up delicious soup or create classic comfort foods with this Campbell's 50 oz. can of cream of mushroom condensed soup. Featuring a smooth consistency, this soup is made with real cream, earthy mushrooms, and robust garlic for a rich and hearty taste. Its familiar flavor will be a popular addition to the menu of your school, health care facility, restaurant, hotel, or diner! Best of all, this wholesome soup is low in calories per serving, making it a healthy menu item you can feel great about serving. Featuring the classic Campbell's flavor your guests know and trust, this soup is proof that nothing beats the original.

Thanks to its condensed formula and simple preparation, this soup will help to cut down on prep time and labor costs in your kitchen, making it easy for you to get delicious soup to your hungry customers faster. To prepare, simply combine one can of soup with one can of water in a 4 quart pot. Simmer and whisk over low heat until warmed through, then serve! For a creamier end result, combine half portions of milk and water. Once it's heated, simply ladle out portions of soup into a bowl or cup. Pair it with a pack of crackers, garnish it with crunchy croutons, or serve it with a freshly-baked roll or crisp side salad. Keep things simple by offering it a la carte or with half of a sandwich for the perfect lunch combination. Cream of mushroom is also an essential base for a variety of classic comfort foods. Use it to create green bean casserole topped with crispy onions, hearty beef stroganoff, creamy Swedish meatballs, or rich scalloped potatoes. It makes a great addition to casseroles of all kinds, stews, and even gravy!

For more than 150 years, Campbell's has been a trusted name in American households. With humble roots as a wholesale produce distributor, Campbell's made a name for itself when company president John T. Dorrance invented the process of condensing soup, allowing shelf-stable soup to be sold in cans all over the country. Campbell's groundbreaking canned soup drew international attention and earned the company a bronze medal at the 1900 Paris Exposition. This medallion still appears on cans of Campbell's soup to this day! Over the decades, Campbell's has developed new products and acquired new brands, but has remained true to their original mission to bring their customers wholesome, nutritious food that enriches lives. Perhaps that's what has helped Campbell's remain a household name, pop art icon, and trusted brand for more than a century. Browse Campbell's extensive line of foodservice offerings to find delicious solutions for your establishment that carry the Campbell's name your customers know.

  • Authentic Taste: Enjoy the traditional, spicy kimchi flavor combined with savory chicken broth.
  • Quick and Easy: Ready in minutes, providing a hassle-free meal solution for busy days.
  • High Quality: Made from premium ingredients to ensure a satisfying, delicious meal every time.
  • Convenient Packaging: Each case includes 12 individual packs, perfect for on-the-go meals or easy storage.

Whether you’re a fan of oriental cuisine or looking to try something new, Mr. Noodles Soup Chicken Kimchi is your go-to choice for a quick, tasty, and authentic meal.

Storage and Usage• Package: paper laminate container. Storage: cool, dry environment, temperature less than 80F, relative humidity less than 75%.
Marketing Statements
• Canada's #1 Brand of oriental noodle
Culinary Applications
• Single serve portions in a self contained bowl.
Preparation and Cooking Instructions
• 1) Pull back lid half way. Empty flavour packets and add boiling water to the inside line. 2) Close lid and let stand for 3 minutes. 3) Remove lid, stir and enjoy

product_name: Nongshim Spicy Kimchi Bowl Noodle Soup 86g (12 PACK) | Authentic Korean Flavor
short_description:
Introducing Nongshim Spicy Kimchi Bowl Noodle Soup 86g (12 PACK) | Authentic Korean Flavor | Microwavable & Recyclable Bowl

Bring the bold and spicy flavors of Korean cuisine to your table with Nongshim Spicy Kimchi Bowl Noodle Soup! This delicious noodle soup features authentic Korean flavor with real pieces of kimchi, making it a convenient and satisfying meal choice. Each pack contains 12 x 86g microwavable and recyclable bowls for easy preparation and minimal waste.

Why Choose Nongshim Spicy Kimchi Bowl Noodle Soup?

  1. Authentic Korean Flavor: Enjoy the bold and spicy taste of kimchi in this delicious noodle soup, featuring real pieces of kimchi for an authentic Korean experience.

  2. No Artificial Preservatives: Nongshim Spicy Kimchi Bowl Noodle Soup is free from TBHQ, ensuring a healthier and more natural meal option.

  3. No MSG Added: Indulge in the rich flavors of this noodle soup without worrying about added MSG.

  4. Cholesterol-Free: Maintain a healthier diet with this cholesterol-free noodle soup.

  5. Microwavable & Recyclable Bowl: Conveniently prepare your meal in minutes with the microwavable and recyclable bowl.

  6. 12 x 86g Pack: Stock up on your favorite noodle soup with this 12-pack, perfect for satisfying your cravings whenever they strike.

Nongshim Spicy Kimchi Bowl Noodle Soup, 86g, 12 PACK, Authentic Korean Flavor, Microwavable & Recyclable Bowl, instant noodles, gourmet ramen, quick meal, easy preparation, Asian cuisine, comfort food, lunch option, convenient cooking, tangy spice, eco-friendly packaging, on-the-go meal, satisfying taste

Savor the authentic flavors of Korea with Nongshim Spicy Kimchi Bowl Noodle Soup 86g (12 PACK). This delicious and convenient noodle soup features real pieces of kimchi, no MSG, and is cholesterol-free.

product_name: A-Sha x Hot Ones Smoky Chili Ramen Noodle Soup, Net WT 2.5 oz (72g)
short_description: Hot Ones is all about the heat: hottest wings, hottest celebrity guests, and, of course, the hottest talk show in America. It makes sense that they’d partner with the hottest noodle brand, A-Sha Foods (a.k.a. Taiwan’s #1 Rated Noodle), to create the ultimate spicy challenge, with a noodle-y twist. Best of all, you can bravely face this spicy showdown right in your own kitchen! Our collaboration features a lineup of three increasingly spicy ramen noodle flavors, inspired by the daring heat of Hot Ones. Each flavor also includes a Bonus Heat Pack for you to turn up the heat even more - if you dare. Embrace your inner Spice Lord by stocking up on your favorite fiery flavor or hosting your own challenge with our entire lineup! A-Sha x Hot Ones promises flavorful heat, and a spicy noodle experience you won’t forget. Think you can handle it?

product_name: Pack of 6 - Amy's Kitchen - Organic Tortilla Soup
short_description: Inspired by Mexican flavours, our chef came up with Amy's take on this classic soup. Organoic sun-ripened tomatoes, corn masa, bell peppers, black beans and fire roasted sweet potatoes combined with organic spices make our Organic Tortilla Soup distinctive and delicious.

product_name: Campbell’s Condensed Tomato Soup, Sodium Reduced, 48 oz Cans (12/Case) – Classic Rich Flavor
short_description:
Relish the classic taste of Campbell's Sodium Reduced Tomato Soup, the one you always remember. Whether enjoyed on its own or used as an ingredient in your favorite recipes, this versatile soup delivers a rich, comforting flavor with reduced sodium content. Easy to prepare by simply reconstituting with water, it's perfect for any occasion and can be stored easily as it requires no refrigeration.

Key Features:

  • Classic Flavor with Reduced Sodium: Enjoy the timeless taste of Campbell's Tomato Soup with less sodium.
  • Versatile Usage: Perfect as a standalone soup or as an ingredient in various recipes.
  • Easy Preparation: Simply reconstitute with water for a quick and delicious meal.
  • Convenient Storage: Shelf-stable and requires no refrigeration, making it easy to store.
  • Bulk Packaging: Comes in a 48 OZ size, packed 12 per case, ensuring you always have enough on hand.

Make every meal memorable with Campbell's Sodium Reduced Tomato Soup

Storage and Usage• Promptly refrigerate any unused portion in a separate container. Recommend use by date on can. Store unopened can at room temperature.
Marketing Statements
• Easy to prepare: Reconstitute with water
• Versatile: Can be used as-is or as an ingredient
• Easy to store: Shelf stable requires no refrigeration
Culinary Applications
• Serve as an appetizer or as part of a light meal. Excellent for use on soup and salad bars, and serving lines.
Preparation and Cooking Instructions
• In a 4 quart pot combine one can of soup and one can of water. Simmer over low heat, stirring often.
• For Cream of Tomato, in a 4 quart pot combine one can of soup with one can of milk. Simmer over low heat, stirring often

product_name: Great Value No Salt Added Dark Red Kidney Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Great Value Canned Dark Red Kidney Beans with no salt added are a perfect addition to any delicious chili, salads and soups. The satisfying, affordable beans are a great pantry staple, keep a can or two on hand in the kitchen to star in a family meal this week.

product_name: Great Value Six Bean Medley Canned Mixed Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Increase the nutritional value of your recipes with Great Value Six Bean Medley Canned Mixed Beans. This bean medley is low in fat, packed with nutrients and features a healthy blend of legumes, including chickpeas, red kidney beans, black-eyed peas, white beans, Romano beans and baby lima beans to provide a high source of dietary fibre. Convenient and ready-to-use, you can create a canned bean salad that can be enjoyed on its own with light dressing or add it to salads, stews, soups and sauces for hearty snacks and meals.

product_name: Great Value No Salt White Kidney Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Help your family fuel up at suppertime with the hearty and affordable goodness of Great Value White Kidney Beans, minus the extra salt. These beans are a great addition to your favourite soup, chili and burrito recipes.

product_name: Great Value Black Turtle Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Whether as a side dish or as part of a salad,  Great Value Black Turtle Beans are an easy and affordable way to add texture and flavour to your meal. Want to spice things up for supper? Try adding a can of Great Value Black Turtle Beans to your family's favourite chili recipe, for a hearty and home-cooked meal.

product_name: Great Value Pinto Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Great Value Pinto Beans are flavourful beans that are easy to add to your daily meal plan, providing 8 g of fibre per 175 g serving to your favourite dishes. Use Great Value Pinto Beans in a burrito, paired with brown rice, or in the next pot of chili you make your family.

product_name: Green Giant Cut Wax Beans, 398 ml
short_description: Canadian grown, Green Giant Cut Wax Beans are deliciously tasty, cut in bite-sized pieces and canned quickly to preserve freshness and flavour.

product_name: Heinz Original Beans in Tomato Sauce, Casein-Free, 398mL
short_description: For years, Heinz has proudly provided the highest quality products. Our Heinz Original Beans in Tomato Sauce are no exception! Try these rich, flavourful beans in a hearty sauce for the perfect complement to a variety of meals. Heinz Beans have been proudly prepared in Canada for over 100 years!

product_name: Great Value Dark Red Kidney Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Great Value Dark Red Kidney Beans are the perfect beans to perk up your next batch of chili and homemade soups! Each can of Great Value Dark Red Kidney Beans is a welcome affordable addition to keep stocked on your pantry shelves all year long.

product_name: Great Value Navy Beans, 540 mL

<100% Wild Caught
CLOVER LEAF®’s regular Light Tuna is Skipjack and is darker and has a fuller flavour than either Albacore (white) Tuna or Yellowfin (premium light) Tuna.
CLOVER LEAF® Flaked Light Tuna is packed in water as small size pieces, or “flakes”.
CLOVER LEAF®’s Skipjack Flaked Light Tuna in Water has no preservatives or additives and is packed in BPA free cans!
We changed the salt to all natural sea salt (not all sea salt is all natural).
CLOVER LEAF®’s Skipjack Flaked Light Tuna in Water contains MSC* certified sustainable Skipjack Tuna as denoted by the MSC blue fish logo on the packaging.

CLOVER LEAF® tuna is wild & traceable.

This means that you are choosing certified sustainable seafood that’s wild caught through sustainable fishing methods from certified sustainable fisheries, guarding oceans from being overfished and protecting marine animals. Look for the blue fish MSC logo on our packaging.

Our delicious, melty personal pepperoni pizzas are crispy and ready in minutes, so you can be on the go in no time. Whether it's part of a mid-week dinner or a late-night study session with friends, our single serve frozen pizzas are ready when you need them. Easy to make and easier to enjoy, these deep dish single pepperoni pizzas serve up quality and flavor in minutes so you can get back to what matters. With two individual frozen pizzas per package, you can choose to make one or both. Just bake the frozen pizza in the oven for 22-24 minutes at 375°F or microwave for 2.5-3.5 minutes. In no time you're ready to enjoy a crispy, melty and perfectly crunchy pepperoni pizza that will satisfy you on the go. Keep pizza singles frozen until you're ready to enjoy. No matter the occasion, you can count on RED BARON. You can quickly bake our frozen single serve pizzas as part of an easy dinner or microwave them in minutes and take them with you wherever you're headed. Our frozen deep dish personal pizzas are so simple to make, giving you more time to focus on the people and moments that matter. Make on-the-go easier with a RED BARON Deep Dish Singles Pepperoni Pizza!

product_name: McCain® Pockets® Ham & Cheddar, 6 pack, Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients, 6 x 540g
short_description: McCain® Pockets® Ham & Cheddar are the convenient and delicious way to satisfy your hunger on the go. • Made with mozzarella cheese
• Topped with ham and pineapple
• Cook Time: 18-19 minutes
• Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients

Cooking Instructions
1. Preheat oven to 400 °F (205 °C).
2. Remove pizza from all packaging.
3. Place frozen pizza directly on the middle oven rack. Bake 18-19 min and until cheese is melted and crust is golden brown.

CAUTION: Pizza will be very hot!

product_name: McCain® Superfries® Crinkle Cut Fries, Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients, 650g
short_description: When the time calls for fingers over forks, reach for McCain® Superfries® Crinkle Cut French fries. These delicious frozen French fries are famous for their signature grooves that make them perfect for dipping. Their unique shape provides an amazing texture, and like all McCain fries they bake up deliciously in the oven and equally crispy and crunchy in the air fryer. Whether you’ve got friends over for the game or want to add some excitement to your next family dinner, pop these frozen McCain fries into the oven or air fryer to see why McCain Crinkle Cut French fries are truly a cut above. Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients. COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Air fryer - preheat to 360°F (182°C), fill basket halfway, air fry for 12-13 minutes, sliding out basket and shaking fries halfway through. Oven - preheat to 425°F (218°C) and cook for 18-22 minutes, turning halfway through. See full details on packaging.

product_name: McCain® Smiles® - Smiley Face Fries, 650g
short_description: Meals are more fun with McCain® Smiles®. COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Air fryer - preheat to 300°F (150°C), arrange frozen McCain Smiles in a single layer in basket, air fry for 7-9 minutes to a light golden colour. short_description:

The secret is out: serious steak lovers on a budget covet tri tip steak. And AAA Angus Beef Tri Tip Sirloin Steak, Your Fresh Market™ delivers the rich, beefy flavour they crave! Cut from the bottom sirloin, this AAA Angus tri tip steak rivals ribeye for flavour and tenderness. With its excellent fat marbling, it’s a natural for the BBQ grill and quick pan-searing.

product_name: Boneless Top Blade Steak Value Pack Cut From Canada AA, 6–12 steaks, 0.70 - 1.20 KG
short_description:
Steak night... but make it budget friendly. No problem: we’ve got your menu covered with AA Tender Chuck Steaks (Value Pack)!

An affordable alternative to filet mignon or tenderloin, chuck tender steaks are lean but tender, with a wonderfully delicate flavour. Give them that melt-in-your-mouth texture by marinating them in a vinegar-based marinade (or fresh lemon juice!) and giving them a quick pound with the mallet before grilling them on the BBQ.

Or, for a more fall-apart-on-the-fork texture, braise ’em low and slow in a Dutch oven to bring out all their flavour and tenderness.

Cut from AA Canadian beef, our tender chuck steak value pack is vacuum sealed for freshness.

short_description:
Get a mouthwatering weeknight dinner on the table in a flash with our Beef Eye Of Round Fast Fry Steaks. Cut from AA Canadian eye of round, each package contains 5 to 7 thin steaks that cook up fast in the pan or on the grill.

Bring out their tenderness with a quick marinade in pineapple juice or your favourite sauce, then cook them quickly to lock in their flavour and juices. (Alternatively, you can cook them low and slow with plenty of sauce in a crockpot for a tender, low-maintenance meat dish.)

Serve them like steak or toss ’em on a bun with cooked onions, cheese and sauce. Easy-peasy and oh-so good!

product_name: AA Boneless Rib Steak (0.15-0.425kg), 1 steak, 0.15 - 0.43 KG
short_description:
Skip the steakhouse and treat yourself to an epic steak dinner at home! You can’t go wrong with AA Beef Boneless Rib Steak. Also known as ribeye, this tender cut is packed with bold, beefy flavour, making it the king of steaks.

Whether you’re a stickler for rare, medium-rare, medium or even well-done steak, the rich marbling of this boneless rib steak will ensure you bite into the most tender and flavourful beef around!

A must for the BBQ, ribeye can also be prepared on a cast iron fry pan. You don’t have to do much to bring out its incredible flavour: just season it with salt and pepper or your favourite steak spice blend: that’s all it needs. Bon appétit!

product_name: AA Striploin Steak (0.13-0.4kg), 1 steak, 0.13 - 0.40 KG
short_description:
Summer’s here and we’re here with the sizzle: Beef Striploin Steak! Cut from AA Canadian boneless striploin, this is the bold, beefy steak meat lovers dream of.

Also known as NY strip, this premium, moderately marbled cut (1 steak per tray) is known for its tenderness, juiciness and rich, beefy flavour.

The ultimate BBQ steak, striploin grills like a dream. Its rich marbling melts into the meat, giving it the tender texture and robust flavour it is known for.

There isn’t much you need to do to prepare a winning striploin steak. Season it, slap it on the grill (or cast iron fry pan) to your preferred doneness, then plate it with potatoes and a green salad. Done and done!

product_name: Arrezzio Classi Tomato Whole San Marzano Style Basil 2.84L/96 oz (6/Case)
short_description:
Experience Authentic Italian Flavor with Arrezzio Classi San Marzano Style Tomatoes

Transform your culinary creations with the exquisite taste of Arrezzio Classi Tomato Whole San Marzano Style Basil. Crafted from the finest whole peeled pear tomatoes, these premium tomatoes are packed fresh from California's best harvest, ensuring unparalleled quality and flavor.

Key Features:

  • Superior Quality: Made from whole peeled pear tomatoes, ensuring a rich, authentic taste that elevates any dish.
  • Fresh and Flavorful: Packed in heavy juice with a fresh basil leaf, these tomatoes bring a burst of natural sweetness and aromatic freshness to your recipes.
  • Generous Drain Weight: With a minimum 63.5-ounce drain weight, you get more tomatoes and less liquid, perfect for robust sauces and hearty dishes.
  • San Marzano Style: Emulating the renowned San Marzano tomatoes, known for their sweet flavor and low acidity, ideal for Italian cuisine.
  • Pure and Natural: Free from calcium chloride, non-GMO, allergen-free, and Halal, ensuring a pure and healthy choice for your kitchen.
  • Certified Quality: Kosher certified, meeting the highest standards of quality and dietary requirements.

Elevate Your Culinary Creations

Arrezzio Classi tomatoes are the secret ingredient to achieving authentic Italian flavor. Their natural pear shape and heavy juice make them perfect for creating rich, flavorful sauces, soups, and stews. The addition of fresh basil leaves infuses a delightful aroma and taste, bringing a touch of Italy to every dish.

Perfect for Any Recipe

Ideal for gourmet pasta sauces, traditional pizzas, and sophisticated entrees, these San Marzano style tomatoes add depth and richness to any meal. Their sweet and robust flavor profile complements a wide range of recipes, making them a versatile staple in any kitchen.

Order Now

Bring the essence of Italy to your culinary repertoire with Arrezzio Classi Tomato Whole San Marzano Style Basil. Ensure your pantry is stocked with this premium product. Order your 6-case pack today and elevate your dishes to a new level of excellence

Packaging Information
• Six 102-Ounce cans per case • Non-BPA intent cans
Size and Shape of Product
• Whole peeled Pear tomatoes packed in heavy tomato juice • Typical red colour • 102-ounce can, 6.040" x 6.040" x 6.975"
Yield or Serving Size
• 132 - 1/2 cup (130g) servings per case
Servings per Case
• 132
Quality and Format
• Conventional. Not Organic.

• Long English Cucumbers are the perfect healthy snack!

product_name: Lemon Cucumber Seeds
short_description: Size:Package = 3 grams 65 days to harvest. Sunny yellow baseball sized fruits with white to bright yellow flesh resemble a lemon growing from the vine. The Lemon cucumber is a unique variety of cucumber that is sweet and tender. The Lemon cucumber is round and yellow. Since this variety is mature in just sixty five days, a steady harvest can be achieved by planting regularly throughout the season. Package contains 3 grams, approximately 150 Lemon Cucumber Seeds. Planting Instructions: Germination: 6 to 10 days at 75 to 85F. Plant 1' deep, 24' apart with about 48' between rows.

product_name: David's Garden Seeds Cucumber Pickling Eureka 1925 (Green) 25 Non-GMO, Hybrid Seeds
short_description: Very dark green, firm fruits have a medium to small seed cavity. Hand harvest. David’s Garden Seeds is a Veteran owned business that has been offering quality since 2009.

product_name: Burpless #26 Hybrid Cucumber Seeds
short_description: Burpless #26 Hybrid Cucumber Seeds: 50 days. Dark green, straight cucumbers to 12 inches long. A very early cucumber with a thin skin and a mild flavor with no bitterness. Superior in eating quality. Good for fresh markets and trellised gardens. Resistant to Downey mildew, Powdery mildew, and Cucumber Mosaic virus. Package contains approximately 15 Burpless #26 Hybrid Cucumber Seeds. Burpless #26 Hybrid Cucumber Seeds - Planting Instructions: Germination: 6 to 10 days at 75 to 85 F. Plant seeds 1 inch deep, 24 inches apart with 48 inches between rows.

product_name: Pride Of India - Spicy Chickpea Masala Papadum Lentil Crisp, 10 count (3.53oz - 100gm) - Microwaveable Instant Chips, Gluten-Free Vegan Crackers, Healthy Protein, Fiber & Iron Rich Snacks
short_description: Pride of India incorporates gourmet-grown food and herbal products from India into our daily life. These all-natural ingredients help enhance the overall health of the human body. Pride of India is family owned and operated, and we manufacture our products in the USA. Indian papadums (poppadoms or papad) are a traditional Indian snack food. They are similar to tortillas and flatbreads. Our papadums are made of chickpeas, lentils and Indian spices. Lentils contain healthy protein, iron, and fiber. Plus, they help reduce cholesterol. Because these lentil crisps are gluten free and don’t have trans fats, they are a healthier snack than traditional potato chips. These papadums are also handmade by women in India, and each purchase of these lentil crisps contributes to small businesses and women empowerment in India. Popadums are usually made as a dough that needs to rest before baking. These lentil crisps, however, are ready in seconds! Just put them over a heat source (oven, microwave, stove, etc.) for 60 to 90 seconds until crispy. Lentil crisps are a great meal starter or snack. With an intoxicating blend of Indian spices, you can eat them alone or dip them in sauces, curries, or hummus. This package contains 10 chili chickpea spicy papadum. Try other flavors of lentil crisps, and shop other health and beauty products by Pride of India.

  • Convenient and Individually Wrapped: Perfect for enjoying anywhere, anytime.

Why Choose Tim Hortons Apple Fritter Granola Bars?

Experience the sweet comfort of Apple Fritter Granola Bars from Tim Hortons—a convenient and peanut-free snack for any occasion. With the 6-case pack, you'll always have a delicious, wholesome treat on hand, whether at work, school, or during your busy day

product_name: Ionized Alkaline Water 9.5 pH, Purified Hydration, Enhanced With Electrolytes for a Clean, Smooth Taste, Reverse Osmosis Purified, Recyclable 1L Bottle, 1 L
short_description: Taste the Difference. Feel the Hydration. Take hydration to the next level with ESSENTIA ionized alkaline water. A remineralized treated water with a pH level of 9.5 or higher that provides refreshing hydration and a clean, smooth taste. We use a proprietary process that can transform water from any source into ESSENTIA Water. First, we purify water through reverse osmosis and microfiltration to remove contaminants. Next, we infuse the water with trace amounts of electrolytes for a clean, smooth taste that complements the body’s natural mix. Finally, through the ionization process, bitter-tasting ions are removed, creating alkaline ESSENTIA Water. Our convenient 1L bottles are good for hydrating during your workout, a day at work, or on-the-go and are recyclable (be sure to remove the label first). ESSENTIA was established in 1998 with the mission to inspire people everywhere to do the things that matter to them most. Stay hydrated and stay after it with ESSENTIA Water.
